ModMetaData.name: Kraltech Industries
ModMetaData.author: BlackMarket420
ModMetaData.description: Adds powerful mechanoids that you can challenge and gestate which includes 3 new mechanoid bosses and an ultra boss, new weapons and apparel that you can research and craft, new buildings to construct, new items and goodies that you can abuse, and a custom faction that you can befriend or challenge if you so dare.
